thread.title: Hytrol Conveyor Customer Care Earns Praise from Integration Partner Grupo International EICOM
thread.title_full: Hytrol Conveyor Customer Care Earns Praise from Integration Partner Grupo International EICOM

author: prbuzz.com
title: Hytrol Conveyor Customer Care Earns Praise from Integration Partner Grupo International EICOM
text:
Hytrol Conveyor Company, Inc., manufacturer of advanced conveyor systems, controls, and solutions has the industry’s strongest integration partner network. Integration partners allow Hytrol a competitive advantage: familiarity with local customers and accessibility to immediate assistance.
Tony Sartin heads up the Customer Care Center at Hytrol and ensures the needs of the 100+ integration partners are met and addressed quickly, efficiently, and accurately. One integration partner is Grupo International EICOM (GIEicom). Orlando Meneses at GIEicom, noted, “The attention in Spanish has helped me answer questions from parts in fast time, this allow me to answer and suggest quick fixes to my customers. David Pantoja and Yunuen Rincon are giving good support to my technical department.”
GIEicom is the leader in creating and implementing turnkey solutions to systematize and automate product flows. The company has hundreds of success stories, in which advanced technologies are used. GIEicom is a multinational engineering company with corporate intralogistics in Mexico.
About Hytrol Conveyor Company, Inc.
Hytrol’s Technology Center is the birthplace for many industry-changing solutions, such as EZLogic® accumulation conveyors and the E24™, an energy efficient, motor driven roller conveyor series. These technologies are complemented by Hytrol’s sortation offerings, the ProSort 400 Elite series high speed shoe sorter, as well as the ProSort MRT series narrow belt sorter. Hytrol works closely with integration partners to provide custom design and engineering service, a key competitive differentiator and added value proposition.
For nearly 70 years, Hytrol Conveyor Co., Inc. (www.hytrol.com) has demonstrated an unwavering dedication to understanding the unique material handling needs of businesses. Hytrol is focused on creating innovative, customized conveyor solutions that help companies achieve lean manufacturing, e-commerce, fulfillment, warehouse, and distribution goals. Hytrol's consistent growth, on target for the best year in company history, is strengthened by its Integration Partner Network, with over 100 locations worldwide. Follow Hytrol on Twitter @hytrol.
